title: Italy in its original glory, ruine, and revival being an exact survey of the whole geography and history of that famous country, with the adjacent islands of Sicily, Malta, &c. : and whatever is remarkable in Rome (the mistress of the world) and all those towns and territories mentioned in antient and modern authors / translated out of the originals for general satisfaction, by Edmund Warcupp, Esquire.
author: Schottus, Franciscus, 1548-1622.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by S. Griffin for H. Twyford, Tho. Dring and I. Place ...,
